subject: Fwd: Order #SSN1587 confirmed
description_text:
Hello, I purchased these items over 2 weeks ago but have not had any update or email about my order. Can you please provide an update, when it will be sent and delivered. Regards, George From: George Noveski <george.noveski@gmail.com> Date: 10 June 2025 at 5:56:50 pm AEST To: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> Subject: Re: Order #SSN1587 confirmed ﻿ Hello, Can you tell me the progress of this order please. Thanks and regards, George On 1 Jun 2025, at 9:10 am, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 









 
 
  
    Thank you for your purchase!
  
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN1587
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thank you for your purchase!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We're getting your order ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent.

conversations.body_text: Hi George Noveski,  The shipment of the VAM Pro motor was delayed due to a holdup with the motor housing. The housings have arrived today, and we will be shipping your order between June 16th and 18th. Thank you for your understanding and support!
